So Naaman <S%H5283><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with his horses <S%H5483><s%> and with his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Elisha <S%H477><s%>.

In this thing <S%H1697><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> pardon <S%H5545><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: when my master <S%H113><s%> goeth <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Rimmon <S%H7417><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> there <S%H8172><s%>, and he leaneth on my hand <S%H3027><s%>, and I bow <S%H7812><s%> myself in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Rimmon <S%H7417><s%>, when I bow <S%H7812><s%> myself in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Rimmon <S%H7417><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> pardon <S%H5545><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> in this thing <S%H1697><s%>.
